subject: Football
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Drew Brees threw for four scores and Deuce McAllister set a Saints record with his 54th career touchdown Monday night as New Orleans rolled to a 51-29 win over the visiting Green Bay Packers.
snippet: Drew Brees threw for four scores and Deuce McAllister set a Saints record with his 54th career touchdown Monday night as New Orleans rolled to a 51-29 win over the visiting Green Bay Packers.
